DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Change posture and move into attack range of the given target.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>target</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllAggregatesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>changePosture</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Change Posture</myLabel> <myToolTip>Change posture before moving to attack</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>newPosture</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Posture</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Hasty Attack</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Hasty Attack;Deliberate Attack</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
